v8:item.v8:content: ContextMenu CRReceipts document CRReceipt return create based on
ContextMenu CRReceipts document CRReceipt return create based on

Settings.QueryText: SELECT DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.Ref, DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.DeletionMark, DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.Archival, CASE WHEN DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.RetailReceiptNo > 0 THEN VALUE(Enum.RetailReceiptStatuses.Issued) ELSE DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.Status END AS Status, DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.Number, DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.Date, DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.Posted, DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.DocumentCurrency, DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.CashRegister, DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.CashSession, DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.RetailReceiptNo, DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.Entity, DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.Warehouse, DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.DocumentAmount, CASE WHEN VALUETYPE(DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.Ref) = TYPE(Document.RetailReceiptReturn) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS ThereIsBillForReturn, DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.Type, CAST(DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.Comment AS STRING(500)) AS Comment FROM DocumentJournal.CashRegisterReceipts AS DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts

v8:item.v8:content: ContextMenu CRReceipts document CRReceipt return create based on
ContextMenu CRReceipts document CRReceipt return create based on

Settings.QueryText: SELECT DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.Ref, DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.DeletionMark, DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.Archival, CASE WHEN DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.RetailReceiptNo > 0 THEN VALUE(Enum.RetailReceiptStatuses.Issued) ELSE DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.Status END AS Status, DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.Number, DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.Date, DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.Posted, DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.DocumentCurrency, DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.CashRegister, DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.CashSession, DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.RetailReceiptNo, DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.Entity, DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.Warehouse, DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.DocumentAmount, CASE WHEN VALUETYPE(DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.Ref) = TYPE(Document.RetailReceiptReturn) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS ThereIsBillForReturn, DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.Type, CAST(DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts.Comment AS STRING(500)) AS Comment FROM DocumentJournal.CashRegisterReceipts AS DocumentJournalCashRegisterReceipts
